@leoniedoyle @In_The_Taratory It's what @ShaneRattenbury has been considering. I'd say exemption would be crucial to successful bike share.
@leoniedoyle Moreover it can be a gateway experience for people who otherwise wouldn't go to the expense and trouble.
@leoniedoyle It's not about commuting etc. It's about short convenience trips. I've used bike share in cities when my bike was at hotel etc
